description: Numbers n such that 74*2^n-1 is prime.
references: Computed by Joe K. Crump (joecr(AT)carolina.rr.com) and (mostly) by _David Broadhurst_.
links: Ray Ballinger and Wilfrid Keller, List of primes k.2^n + 1 for k < 300
Wilfrid Keller, List of primes k.2^n - 1 for k < 300
Index entries for sequences of n such that k*2^n-1 (or k*2^n+1) is prime
author: _David Broadhurst_, Dec 22 1999
extensions: _David Broadhurst_, Dec 26 1999 reports that primality up to n=51476 is now proved, using Yves Gallot's proth.exe.
